name: MetaLeadership
0:
”Alexa ask meta leadership tell me about the book”
”Alexa ask meta leadership where is it available”
”Alexa ask meta leadership to tell me some highlights”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meta leadership
des: The purpose of this skill is to provide the user with some information about the book Meta Leadership by J. Michael Stattelman that is currently available for purchase on Amazon in print, Kindle for e-reader, Audible and I-Tunes for audio-book. In this book, Meta Leadership: The Most Powerful IT Leadership Strategies Available, you will be able to uncover some of the tactics and strategies used by truly formidable leaders through focusing on "Next Practices" over "Best Practices". Learn the proven strategies used by the most advanced entities today, to effectively and efficiently lead teams with this ultimate guide to organizational leadership. In our fast-paced, highly competitive world of today, powerful leaders are often sought after for their ability to get things done and marshal people to work as a team to achieve a specific objective. The problem is that most people can excel at the technical or task-based aspects of their particular job. However, from C-suite to Mid-level executives, Analysts, Engineers, HR to Accounting and many more often have under developed or antiquated leadership skills, limiting them from accomplishing their absolute best. In Meta Leadership, Michael Stattelman pulls back the curtain and shows you the techniques to accelerate your effectiveness as a leader and how you can build and foster a higher performing collective committed to continual excellence. Leadership is something that some people are born with and others learn along the way. It can come naturally or must be found from deep within. But whichever type of leader you are there will always be room for improvement.With chapters that cover:•Addressing Latency, for quick wins.•How to use real incentives to bring out the best in your team.•Wargaming scenarios.•The power of 3's•How to deal with the Agency Problem.•How to capitalize time!•How to make better and faster decisions....and tons more!Designed for professionals and career-minded people, Meta Leadership is overflowing with profound insights and practical, actionable advice you can use to improve your leadership skills. Concisely written and designed to be a quick reference and read for busy individuals. Whether you're a Fortune 500 executive, Small business owner or an entry-level employee, there's something in these pages for you. Futureproof your skill set and career today, Buy the future of leadership now!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
